      @NonNull String toXHtml(@NonNull String namespace) throws XMLStreamException, IOException
      Get the Extensible HyperText Markup Language (XHTML) representation of this markup string.
      Parameters:
      namespace - the XML namespace to use for XHTML elements
      Returns:
      the XHTML
      Throws:
      XMLStreamException - if an error occurred while establishing or writing to the underlying XML stream
      IOException - if an error occurred while generating the XHTML data

    • getInserts

      @NonNull default List<InsertAnchorExtension.InsertAnchorNode> getInserts()
      Get markup inserts used as place holders within the string.
      Returns:
      a list of insets or an empty list if no inserts are present

    • getInserts

      Returns:
      the matching insert statements

      Write the Extensible HyperText Markup Language (XHTML) representation of this markup string to the provided stream writer.
      Parameters:
      namespace - the XML namespace to use for XHTML elements
      streamWriter - the XML stream to write to
      Throws:
      XMLStreamException - if an error occurred while establishing or writing to the XML stream

    • writeXHtml

      void writeXHtml(@NonNull String namespace, @NonNull org.codehaus.stax2.evt.XMLEventFactory2 eventFactory, @NonNull XMLEventWriter eventWriter) throws XMLStreamException
      Write the Extensible HyperText Markup Language (XHTML) representation of this markup string to the provided stream writer using the provided XML event factory.
      Parameters:
      namespace - the XML namespace to use for XHTML elements
      eventFactory - the XML event factory used to generate XML events to write
      eventWriter - the XML event stream to write to
      Throws:
      XMLStreamException - if an error occurred while establishing or writing to the XML stream
